briefTitle: The Efficacy of Insulin Degludec/Liraglutide in Controlling Glycaemia in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes Inadequately Controlled on GLP-1 Receptor Agonist and OAD Therapy
officialTitle: The Efficacy of Insulin Degludec/Liraglutide in Controlling Glycaemia in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes Inadequately Controlled on GLP-1 Receptor Agonist and OAD Therapy (DUALâ„¢ III -GLP-1 Switch)
summary:
This trial is conducted in Europe, Oceania and the United States of America (USA).

The aim of the trial is to investigate the efficacy of insulin degludec/liraglutide in controlling glycaemia in adults with type 2 diabetes inadequately controlled on glucagon-like peptide-1 (GLP-1) receptor agonist and OAD therapy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Glycosylated Haemoglobin (HbA1c) From Baseline (Randomisation, Visit 2)

effectByArm.arm: Insulin Degludec/Liraglutide + Oral Anti Diabetic Drugs (OADs)
